root.mailContent:
Dear <%anchorCustomer.customerId%>,

As per the requesetd raised by You, we are here to notify that your Master SBR Agreement is Modified under the reference <%sbrId%> for the agreement type: <%agreement.contractReferenceNumber%>.



Please find attached reference copy for your further communications. Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.



If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
OA Admin Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
